ryan thompson, a 38-year-old white non-hispanic male, is a lifelong resident of the metropolitan area of asheville, north carolina, in the south atlantic division of the south census region. with an associate's degree in automotive repair from asheville-buncombe technical community college, ryan has been working as a car mechanic for a local dealership, earning $28,500 annually.
